thread.title: Lincoln forward Nathan Arnold aiming to cut down Burnley | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Lincoln forward Nathan Arnold aiming to cut down Burnley | Daily Mail Online

author: Tom Farmery For The Daily Mail
title: Lincoln forward Nathan Arnold aiming to cut down Burnley | Daily Mail Online
text: Lincoln forward Nathan Arnold is the Imps' team hairdresser aiming to cut down Burnley... but his FA Cup heroics are tinged with sadness Burnley entertain National League side Lincoln City in the FA Cup fifth round Nathan Arnold has played a big role in taking the non-League outfit this far The forward doubles up as the team hairdresser at Sincil Bank He scored the last-gasp winner in the victory over Ipswich in round three Arnold had to deal with a broken home as a kid and his mum's death He has suffered from panic attacks, one of which left him with heart palpitations
